    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Board
    Defines the contract for a Tetris game board, covering brick movement, rotation, holding and spawning, merging into the background, row clearing, and access to view and score data.
    Brick
    Represents a Tetris brick with one or more rotation states.
    BrickGenerator
    Contract for generating Tetris bricks, supporting single and preview retrieval.
    BrickRotator
    Controls rotation state for a brick, tracking the current orientation and providing the next rotation preview.
    ClearRow
    Encapsulates the result of clearing rows: lines removed, updated matrix, and the computed score bonus.
    Constants
    Defines application-wide constant values.
    DownData
    Aggregates data resulting from a down movement, including any cleared rows and the current view state.
    DynamicStartScreen
    Animated start screen with pulsating grid, flying tetrominoes, and particles.
    DynamicStartScreen.Particle
     
    Effects
    UI effect helpers for reflections, glow, score popups, and pulse animations.
    EventSource
    Identifies the origin of a move event (user input or game thread).
    EventType
    Enumerates the types of movement and control events in the game.
    GameBoard
    Implements the Tetris board logic including movement, rotation, holding, spawning bricks, merging into the background, row clearing, and game reset.
    GameController
    Coordinates user input, game board state updates, scoring, and UI events.
    GameEventListener
    Defines UI-side callbacks that respond to game state changes and bindings.
    GameLoopManager
    Manages the main game loop, timing, and mode changes, coordinating periodic drop events and UI interactions.
    GameModeHandler
    Handles switching between game modes, manages timed countdowns, and communicates mode changes to interested consumers.
    GameModeHandler.GameMode
     
    GameOverOverlay
    Game over overlay with restart and exit actions, supporting a special display for new high scores.
    GameRenderer
    Renders the board, active brick, next bricks, and hold brick, supporting standard and upside-down visual modes with utility effects.
    GhostBrickHandler
    Renders and positions a translucent ghost brick indicating the landing position of the active brick, supporting upside-down mode.
    GuiController
    JavaFX controller coordinating UI initialization, input handling, rendering, overlays, and bindings with the core game logic.
    IBrick
    Defines the I-shaped tetromino rotation states.
    InputEventListener
    Defines callbacks for handling user or system input events that affect game state, movement, rotation, holding, dropping, and new game creation.
    JBrick
    Defines the J-shaped tetromino rotation states.
    KeyboardInputManager
    Translates keyboard input into game events, delegating to the controller and renderer for movement, rotation, holding, dropping, and overlay actions.
    LBrick
    Defines the L-shaped tetromino rotation states.
    Main
    Entry point for the application.
    MatrixOperations
    Utility functions for manipulating board and brick matrices including collision detection, merging, row clearing, and copying.
    MoveEvent
    Immutable move event carrying the type and source of an action.
    MusicManager
    Manages game audio playback for music loops and effects, including start-screen music, gameplay loop, one-shot FX, and click sounds.
    NextShapeInfo
    Provides the next rotation state for a brick, including shape matrix and its index position.
    OBrick
    Defines the O-shaped tetromino rotation states.
    OverlayManager
    Coordinates start, help, pause, and game-over overlays; controls transitions, countdowns, and interaction with music and game controller.
    PauseOverlay
    Pause overlay providing resume, main menu, and new game actions.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    Generates bricks using a 7-bag randomization system to balance distribution.
    SBrick
    Defines the S-shaped tetromino rotation states.
    SceneManager
    Scene/layout utilities for centering the game board and binding positions to scene or parent dimensions.
    Score
    Tracks score, high scores per mode, lines cleared, and level progression.
    ScorePopup
    Floating popup that displays score bonuses and combo labels with fade/translate transitions.
    TBrick
    Defines the T-shaped tetromino rotation states.
    ViewData
    Snapshot of the current view state including active brick, position, preview bricks, and held brick.
    ZBrick
    Defines the Z-shaped tetromino rotation states.
